full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Evaluation Consultant Services
#### [English]
#### Reference Number: CB-8670-17731148

#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking the services of an Evaluation Services Consultant to complete an analysis of the current and future social, cultural, economic, and environmental value resulting from funding Indigenous Guardians initiatives from 2018 to present.

#### Legal Basis
Processed under the Federal Government's Trade Agreement (CFTA) regulations.

#### Requirements
The selected Evaluation Services Consultant must possess expertise in the following areas:
* Project monitoring and evaluation
* Analysis of social, cultural, economic, and environmental value

#### Evaluation Criteria
Evaluation will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Notice Details
* Solicitation Number: 5000067218R
* Tender Closing Date: September 15, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* Amendment Number: 1
* Publication Date: August 31, 2023
* Amendment Date: September 15, 2023 
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Contact Information
* Name: Michel Larivière
* Email: michel.larivière@ec.gc.ca
* Phone: (819) 938-3816
* Address: 351, boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3, Canada

#### Required Documents
For detailed information, please refer to the attachment: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8670/5000067218r---npp.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8670/5000067218r---apm.pdf (French)
